news.title: Cabinet Office presentation demanding Free Software from suppliers available online
news.body: A presentation given by the Cabinet Office to a collection Systems Integrator companies outlining its expectations for greater availability and support of Free Software in public sector contracts is available to the public. It makes clear that the government sees great value in high quality FS such as Apache and Drupal, and expects to make both short and long term costs by makeing considerably wider use of them in future.
